Posts.EditableText: How long does it usually take before a moderator checks a published game?  I published a game around a month ago and it is showing as "This game is currently uncategorised as it has not yet been checked by a moderator."
Posts.HTML: How long does it usually take before a moderator checks a published game? I published a game around a month ago and it is showing as "This game is currently uncategorised as it has not yet been checked by a moderator."

Posts.EditableText: I think it's usually quicker than that. Could be that they're all busy at the moment, or have forgotten to check the queue recently. Not sure how many people are doing it now. Usually if it goes on too long, someone will post in the site feedback forum to remind them. I wouldn't be surprised if someone sees your post and it reminds them to go and check the pending games.
